briefTitle: The Effect of Local Anesthesia on Control of Intraoperative Physiologic Parameters and Post Operative Comfort
officialTitle: The Effect of Local Anesthesia When Used in Dental Restorative Cases Under General Anesthesia on Control of Intraoperative Physiologic Parameters and Post Operative Comfort
summary: The purpose of this study is to compare patient responses during and after surgery when local anesthetic is used for dental treatment under general anesthesia (GA) and when it is not used.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: in the evening of the day of surgery, up to 10 hours
